metadata.title: CVE-2022-40152 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: Those using Woodstox to parse XML data may be vulnerable to Denial ofService attacks (DOS) if DTD support is enabled. If the parser is runningon user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes theparser to crash by stackoverflow. This effect may support a denial ofservice attack.

criterions.comment: libxstream-java package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
